评论详情: HUGE! Size down atleast once! Got a medium and I swear they sent me a large or extra large.

These are a dark, dirty wash blue. I thought from the image they were a faded black. So that was a little disappointing. That being said…the denim is a great quality. The stripes and stars are sewn onto the jeans. The weight surprised me, I thought they would be cheaply made…they are not. I’m excited to gift them.
Super cute jeans! My teen loved them however they run big. Size down.
But I have to return it because it's too big for my grand daughter.  Thank you.

The pants look almost exactly like the picture, only the legs are a little less baggy than preferred. I’ll live.  However, the material is thin. Way too thin for $40 jeans.  I do love the carpet-textured details. They’re absolutely gorgeous! I want to devour them.  Overall, I’ll wear them and I’ll love them until they’re ribbons, but I don’t think they’ll live very long ):
NOT tall girl friendly 😂 my ankles are fully out

These don't fit the measurements of any human in existence! The length was about a foot longer than any pants I've ever seen. When I submitted a return request, they told me to ship it back to China at my expense. It's a shame that Amazon is turning into Temu
They are cute, but they have a large waist and a bit too much fabric near the crotch, so it looks weird.
Bought these jeans for a gift and they were a great big hit!
I have thicker thighs and a smaller waist so usually jeans don’t fit me right but this is nicely fitted and and has great quality. But it’s a tiny bit long which im okay about
Beautiful, fit perfect. I'm 5'3'' and 130/135 lbs and so I got a small. It fit great except the waist was a little big on me but nothing too bad. No problems other than that.
Daughter loves this jeans! Fits her well.

I love fun clothing that catches eyes, and these definitely do. The design is super cute and I’m very into it. I’m pretty petite, so these were probably more oversized on me than intended, but I still felt they were flattering and comfortable. The denim material isn’t the best, as in it’s not the softest and has little stretch, but it also isn’t bad at all. Also has real front pockets which is great. These seem to be made well and are definitely a cool piece to have!
These are just the right amount of baggie. They are so comfy and just so around nice

These jeans give 2000's. They're long. The legs are flared. They fit much smaller than expected. I couldn't get them to zip up. Not too baggy, but loose enough to match the y2k aesthetic. The stitching are on point. The quality is great. I deducted 2 stars only because they run small.
but very baggy around the pelvic area

The jeans look exactly like they do in the picture. Same design and color! The only issue I had was that the inside of the denim was a little scratchy. The material felt a bit cheap, especially for the pockets. The zipper and button didn't feel flimsy though, so I think it is very wearable.
